title: Under Old Nell's Skirt - "as bald" does

content.question: The phrase "as bald as if a cyclonic wind had taken his scalp" (Paragraph 2) does all the following EXCEPT

choices.label: describe the grandfather with an image related to the cyclone
particularize the first of several sources of information mentioned in the paragraph
suggest the power of the tornado
express concern about the condition of the grandfather

content.answer: express concern about the condition of the grandfather

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
